byline.contributor: Noam Scheiber contributed reporting from Evanston, Ill.

abstract: Judge Edward M Chen of Federal District Court for Northern California strikes down proposed class-action settlement between Uber and group of its current and former drivers; ruling possibly continues protracted lawsuit that questions main tenet of company's business.

headline.print_headline: Judge Overturns Uber’s Settlement With Its Drivers
headline.main: Judge Overturns Uber’s Settlement With Drivers

snippet: The settlement was “not fair, adequate and reasonable,” the judge said, and the reimbursement was far beneath what might have been won had the suit proceeded....
lead_paragraph: The settlement was “not fair, adequate and reasonable,” the judge said, and the reimbursement was far beneath what might have been won had the suit proceeded.
